name: Swarm of Bats
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

special_abilities.name: Echolocation.
descriptions: The swarm can't use its blindsight while deafened.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing.
descriptions: The swarm has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

special_abilities.name: Swarm.
descriptions: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny bat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Bites.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. Hit: 5 (2d4) piercing damage, or 2 (1d4) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
